basic_information.scholarship_notes: Total awards and amounts based on committee.

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are student teaching in the upcoming academic year. Eligibility Requirements Student preparing for a teaching career Student doing their student teaching when scholarship is awarded Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements All funds from this scholarship will be distributed during student teaching Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
